document.full_text: a pennsylvania man who pleaded guilty to threatening the no. 2 republican in the house of representatives, eric cantor, and his family a year ago was sentenced on thursday to 24 months in prison.
document.title: man who threatened lawmaker headed to prison
lines_and_colors: a pennsylvania man who pleaded guilty to threatening the no. 2 republican in the house of representatives, eric cantor, and his family a year ago was sentenced on thursday to 24 months in prison.
